document.full_text: guangdong province in southern china is tightening rules on foreigners living and working in the province as part of what it calls a clampdown on 'illegal immigration,' according to the official china daily.
document.title: asia: china: crackdown on foreigners
lines_and_colors: guangdong province in southern china is tightening rules on foreigners living and working in the province as part of what it calls a clampdown on 'illegal immigration,' according to the official china daily.
